The files in this folder is the original source data for this model.

The "child outcomes data.xlsx" file was obtained from Chris Desmond of the HSRC.

The "ASSA2008_110309.xls" file contains the ASSA 2008 model. The mortality and
incidence data was extracted from this model. The official website of the ASSA 
2008 model is http://aids.actuarialsociety.org.za/ASSA2008-Model-3480.htm
